Those websites which opens to outside require restful. In UserController

@RequestMapping("update/{id}")
public String update(@PathVariable Integer id){
	System.out.println("id: "+id);
	return "redirect:/user/list.do";//redirect back to page who call update
}

In web.xml

<servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-name>springmvc</servlet-name>
	<url-pattern>/rest/*</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>

In list.jsp

<table>
	<tr>
		<td>Id</td>
		<td>Name</td>
		<td>Age</td>
		<td></td>
	</tr>
	<tr>
		<td>${user.id }</td>
		<td>${user.name }</td>
		<td>${user.age }</td>
		<td>
		  <a href="${pageContext.request.contextPath }/rest/user/update/${user.id }">Update</a>
		</td>
	</tr>
</table>
